answerText: Dubrovnik[10] Dubrovnik is in this former Yugoslav country that owns over a thousand islands in the Adriatic Sea. It has its capital at Zagreb.
heading: STIMPY |2015 | Michigan A - Penn B | 6 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question: This city lies in an exclave cut off from the rest of the country by Bosnia and Herzegovina's twelve-mile coastline. For 10 points each: [10] Name this city that was once the heavily fortified capital of the Republic of Ragusa.
